resources.string: I will remind you to check your vehicle for your child once you leave it. \n\nSimple as that.
A notification will appear when you leave your vehicle to let you know that you should check it for your child.
GoogleApiClient not yet connected. Try again.

string-array.name: notification_messages
string-array.item: You might want to check your car for your child.
Yo! Check your car for your child.
Please check your car for your child.
Check your car for your child right now!
